title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: Datetime values retrieved from a table are displayed in a different format in the dynamic text item and data/text item.
SR:
1. Retrieve datetime values from a table.
2. Check the format of the datetime values in the dynamic text item.
3. Check the format of the datetime values in the data/text item.
